transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hi, I'd like to schedule an appointment please.

transcript.text: Thanks for calling PivotPoint Orthopedics. Part of Pretty Good a I. Am I speaking with Alex?

transcript.text: Got it, Alex. Can you please provide your date of birth?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it, Alex. How may I help you today?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I'd like to schedule a routine annual checkup, please. I'm hoping to get an appointment next week if possible.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it. At Tivot Point Orthopaedics, we offer new patient consultations, follow-up consultations, procedure appointments, and physical therapy sessions. Just to confirm, are you looking for a follow-up consultation for your annual checkup?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I'm actually a new patient, so I'm looking to schedule a new patient consultation for my annual checkup.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Understood. You'd like to book a new patient consultation?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: We have several providers available. Do you have a preferred provider, or would you like me to check?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I don't have a preference, so please feel free to check for me.

transcript.text: Great. Do you have a preferred provider for
